title: Congratulations to MAgIC Lab for three papers accepted on IFAC WC2023
description: The papers entitled 'Robust Output Regulation for Uncertain Linear Minimum Phase Systems under Unknown Control Direction', 'Iteration Learning Control for Uncertain Nonlinear Systems with Time Varying Output Constraint' and 'Robust Output Regulation for Uncertain Discrete-Time LTI Systems under the Effect of a Sinusoidal Disturbance' have been accepted and will be presented on IFAC WC2023 conference held in Yokohama.
